name: Brizerhaus
description: Our house is situated in central position in Ramsau surrounded of old famhouses. The appartment is furnished in style-ful and in  high quality design.

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Our holiday apartment "Dolomit" offers 6 people 55 m² of living space place to enjoy around. The flat disposes of a room, 3 bedrooms as well as kitchen and bath. The noble and comfortable equipment is from Zirbenvollholz.
Equipment
Room, direct garden access, Sat TV, dishwasher, microwave, oven, fridge with freezer compartment, water cooker, coffeemaker, hair hairdrier, towel dryer, full wood piece of furniture, wooden floors, living rooms after the south (very sunny), anti-allergic beds and Pölster
Final cleaning: 65 euro
With a low personal number, please around direct ones
Establishment of contact for the purpose of prize information with family Kröll.
With a low personal number, please around direct ones
Establishment of contact for the purpose of prize information with family Kröll.

Amethyst 4-6 people
